function.name: wb_call_function
function.description: Calls the DLL function pointed by address.

function.name: wb_create_control
function.description: Creates a window control, menu, toolbar, status bar or accelerator.

function.name: wb_create_font
function.description: Creates a new font.

function.name: wb_create_image
function.description: Creates a true-color image measuring width by height pixels.

function.name: wb_create_items
function.description: Creates one or more items in a control.

function.name: wb_create_mask
function.description: Creates a transparency mask of a true-color bitmap.

function.name: wb_create_timer
function.description: Creates a timer in the specified window.

function.name: wb_create_window
function.description: Creates a window of class wclass.

function.name: wb_delete_items
function.description: Deletes an item, a range of items, or all items from a control.

function.name: wb_destroy_font
function.description: Destroys a font created by wb_create_window().

function.name: wb_destroy_image
function.description: Destroys an image created by wb_create_image() or wb_create_mask().

function.name: wb_destroy_timer
function.description: Destroys a timer created with wb_create_timer().

function.name: wb_destroy_window
function.description: Destroys a window created by wb_create_window().

function.name: wb_destroy_control
function.description: Destroys a control created by wb_create_control().

function.name: wb_draw_image
function.description: Draws a bitmap.

function.name: wb_draw_line
function.description: Draws a straight line.

function.name: wb_draw_point
function.description: Draws a point of color, setting the RGB color value of the pixel that exists at the given coordinates.

function.name: wb_draw_rect
function.description: Draws a filled or hollow rectangle.

function.name: wb_draw_text
function.description: Draws a string.

function.name: wb_exec
function.description: Opens or executes a command.

function.name: wb_find_file
function.description: Looks for a file in the Windows and System directories, in this order.

function.name: wb_get_address
function.description: Returns the address (as an integer pointer) of the variable var.

function.name: wb_get_class
function.description: Returns an integer that corresponds to the class of the object (control, window or menu) passed as the parameter.

function.name: wb_get_control
function.description: Returns an integer handle that corresponds to the WinBinder object (control, toolbar item or menu item) wbobject that has the supplied id.

function.name: wb_get_enabled
function.description: Returns TRUE if wbobject is enabled and FALSE otherwise.

function.name: wb_get_function_address
function.description: Returns the address of a library function.

function.name: wb_get_id
function.description: Returns the integer identifier of wbobject.

function.name: wb_get_instance
function.description: Detects a running instance of a WinBinder application.

function.name: wb_get_item_count
function.description: Returns the number of items of wbobject.

function.name: wb_get_item_list
function.description: Returns an array with a list of the child controls in window or control wbobject.

function.name: wb_get_level
function.description: Retrieves an integer representing the level of a control item.

function.name: wb_get_parent
function.description: Returns the handle of the control parent, or the node parent if item specifies a treeview node.

function.name: wb_get_pixel
function.description: Returns the RGB color value of the pixel at the given coordinates.

function.name: wb_get_position
function.description: Returns an array with the position of the control or window related to its parent, in pixels.

function.name: wb_get_registry_key
function.description: Reads a string or integer value from the Windows registry item referenced by key, subkey and entry.

function.name: wb_get_selected
function.description: Returns a value or array with the indices or identifiers of the selected elements or items in wbobject.

function.name: wb_get_size
function.description: Gets the dimensions of a control, window or image.

function.name: wb_get_state
function.description: Retrieves an integer representing the current state of a control item.

function.name: wb_get_system_info
function.description: Returns information about the current system and application, according to the string info.

function.name: wb_get_text
function.description: Gets the text from a window, control, or control item.

function.name: wb_get_value
function.description: Retrieves the value of a control or control item.

function.name: wb_get_visible
function.description: Returns TRUE if wbobject is visible and FALSE otherwise.

function.name: wb_load_image
function.description: Loads the image file filename from disk and returns a handle to it.

function.name: wb_load_library
function.description: Loads a DLL into memory.

function.name: wb_main_loop
function.description: Enters the Windows main loop.

function.name: wb_message_box
function.description: Creates and displays a message box and returns a value according to the button pressed.

function.name: wb_peek
function.description: Gets the contents of a memory area pointed by address.

function.name: wb_play_sound
function.description: Plays a system sound.

function.name: wb_poke
function.description: Sets the contents of a memory area pointed by address.

function.name: wb_refresh
function.description: Refreshes or redraws the WinBinder object wbobject, forcing an immediate redraw if the parameter now is TRUE.

function.name: wb_release_library
function.description: Releases the DLL identified by idlib from memory.

function.name: wb_save_image
function.description: Saves image to file filename.

function.name: wb_send_message
function.description: Sends a Windows message to the HWND handle of the WinBinder object wbobject.

function.name: wb_set_area
function.description: Sets a specific area in a window.

function.name: wb_set_enabled
function.description: Enables or disables control according to the value of enabled.

function.name: wb_set_focus
function.description: Assigns the keyboard focus to wbobject.

function.name: wb_set_font
function.description: Sets the font of control.

function.name: wb_set_handler
function.description: Assigns the callback function fn_handler to window.

function.name: wb_set_image
function.description: Assigns the image source to the WinBinder object wbobject.

function.name: wb_set_item_image
function.description: Retrieves a portion of the image already assigned to a control and assigns it to a item (and optional subitem).

function.name: wb_set_location
function.description: Sets the location of an HTMLControl or sends a special command to it.

function.name: wb_set_position
function.description: Moves the object wbobject to the coordinates xpos, ypos in relation to its parent window.

function.name: wb_set_selected
function.description: Selects one or more items of a control.

function.name: wb_set_size
function.description: Sizes the object wbobject to width and height pixels.

function.name: wb_set_state
function.description: Sets the state of a control item (a treeview node).

function.name: wb_set_style
function.description: Sets or resets one or more styles of the WinBinder object wbobject.

function.name: wb_set_text
function.description: Sets the text of a WinBinder object.

function.name: wb_set_value
function.description: Sets one or more values of a control or control item.

function.name: wb_set_visible
function.description: Shows or hides the WinBinder object wbobject according to the value of visible.

function.name: wb_sort
function.description: Sorts the contents of a control, a control item, a ListView column or a sub-item.

function.name: wb_sys_dlg_color
function.description: Displays the standard Select Color dialog box.

function.name: wb_sys_dlg_open
function.description: Displays the standard Open dialog box.

function.name: wb_sys_dlg_path
function.description: Displays the standard Select Path dialog box.

function.name: wb_sys_dlg_save
function.description: Displays the standard Save As dialog box.

function.name: wb_wait
function.description: This function creates a delay and verify if mouse buttons are pressed and/or the keyboard state.
